individual_metadata.synopsis: Possible dialog during the Lake Encounter (if the player jumps on another raft when another player is in dialog)
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: To trigger in Multiplayer or following these repro steps.REPRO STEPS:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -453.75, 27.06, -541.254. Move to the other raft.5. Talk to Duergar Scout on the top right floor (-451.75, 30.77, -520.25)

automatic_ordering.reasoning: There is only a single session (with an empty string as its name) provided in the input. With only one session, there are no logical ordering constraints (predecessor-successor relationships) or mutual exclusiveness rules that can be derived.

0.speaker: Mind Master Kettel
0.text: One step closer an' you're fish food.
